body_html:
@apaszke great, that might explain why I was having weird convergence problems :) !
But I @sonack is using 0.3.0.post4, which shouldn't be affected by the changes in ATen, is that right?

@sonack yes, that's right. And there is a mention of the drawbacks of in-place operations on Variables in [here])http://pytorch.org/docs/0.3.1/notes/autograd.html#in-place-operations-on-variables).
